Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires unanimous agreement by the parole board to release an inmate on parole
Summary: Requires unanimous agreement by the parole board to release an inmate on parole.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring unanimous agreement by the parole board to release an inmate on parole
